snippet: Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo will be delivering his State of the State address at 1:30 p.m. Wednesday.
abstract: Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo will be delivering his State of the State address at 1:30 p.m. Wednesday.
lead_paragraph: City Room will be streaming Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo's State of the State address at 1:30 p.m., and featuring Twitter commentary from the political reporters Danny Hakim and Thomas Kaplan, the political editor Michael Paulson and the education reporter Winnie Hu. Ms. Hu, meanwhile, has written a primer for SchoolBook on what to listen for on the education front in Mr. Cuomo's speech, including an increase in state aid and incentives for schools to improve student achievement. Tune in to City Room at 1:30, and check out Ms. Hu's piece on SchoolBook.

headline.main: Gearing Up for Cuomo's State of the State Address
